CustomField.formula:
"TS Id: " + ts2_id__c + BR() + "Target Market: " + target_market_link_generator__c + BR() + "Certificate Status: " + CASE( certificateStatus__c , "DISABLED", "disabled", "CANCELLED", "expired", "NO_AUDIT", "no audit", "INTEGRATION", "not yet released", "TEST", "test", "PRODUCTION", "valid" , "") + BR() + "Type: " + TEXT( certificateType__c ) + BR() + "eTrusted ChannelRef: " + eTrusted_Channel_Reference__c +BR()
/* + IF( HealthScore__c > 0 , "Health Score: " + TEXT(ROUND(HealthScore__c,2)) , "") CJA: Commented out on 18.09.2020, until we decide how to proceed with the HealthScore in 10.2020/11.2020 */
CustomField.label: Shop Info
